law.catch_line: Notice to passengers to be displayed.

text.section:
Sec. 31-72. Notice to passengers to be displayed.
It shall be unlawful for any person to operate any taxicab or other passenger vehicle for the public transportation of passengers in the incorporated or unincorporated areas of Miami-Dade County without permanently displaying therein, in such position that it may be easily read by all passengers, a legibly printed notice in form and substance as follows: "It is unlawful for the driver of this vehicle to recommend or solicit patronage for any place of business."
